data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Wilfried Zaha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
In the minute 7, In Wolverhampton, Leander Dendoncker (Wolverhampton) misses the target with a header.
Martin Atkinson awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 9, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to Wolverhampton's area.
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence gets in a shot on goal at Molineux Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 10, Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 12, Rayan Ait-Nouri (Wolverhampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal! Wolverhampton have got their heads in front thanks to a Rayan Ait-Nouri strike.
In the minute 20, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Wolverhampton's Nelson Semedo breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
In Wolverhampton Wolverhampton attack through Leander Dendoncker. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Daniel Podence puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Pedro Neto with an assist there.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolverhampton.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 31, Martin Atkinson signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 33, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 36, Important block from the Wolverhampton defence as Scott Dann fires in a strike for Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Crystal Palace are whistled for offside.
In the minute 41, In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Wolverhampton.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Martin Atkinson will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Wolverhampton drives forward and Pedro Neto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Patrick Van Aanholt (Crystal Palace) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Wolverhampton.
In Wolverhampton Crystal Palace drive forward through Andros Townsend. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Crystal Palace pushes forward through Andros Townsend, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Ruben Neves of Wolverhampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Molineux Stadium.
Jeffrey Schlupp (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Leander Dendoncker for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Molineux Stadium.
Crystal Palace are in shooting range from this free kick.
Crystal Palace are coming forward and Luka Milivojevic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 65, Martin Atkinson awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Crystal Palace make their first substitution with Eberechi Eze replacing Jeffrey Schlupp.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Andros Townsend with Jordan Ayew.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Molineux Stadium.
Adama Traore is replacing Daniel Podence for the home team.
Joao Moutinho is on a sub for Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 78, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace just outside Wolverhampton's area.
The match at Molineux Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Raul Jimenez, who is down injured.
Raul Jimenez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 79, Crystal Palace's Patrick Van Aanholt breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolverhampton.
Adama Traore of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 84, Attention is being given to Wolverhampton’s Joao Moutinho and play has been suspended briefly.
The away team replace Michy Batshuayi with Christian Benteke.
Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) has been shown a straight red card by referee Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 88, Joao Moutinho is back on the pitch.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
It seems as if Raul Jimenez is unable to continue. Fabio Silva replaces him for the home team.
